Question 85) One of the processes used in the treatment of waste is incineration, which has advantages and disadvantages. In SÃ£o Paulo, for example, waste is burned at high temperatures and part of the energy released is transformed into electricity. However, incineration causes pollutant emission in the atmosphere. A way to minimize the disadvantage of incineration, highlighted in the text, is
A) Increase the volume of incinerated waste to increase electricity production.
B) foster the use of filters in the chimneys of incinerators to reduce air pollution.
C) Increase the volume of waste to cheapen the process -related operating costs.
D) foster selective garbage collection in cities to increase the volume of incinerated waste.
E) decrease the incineration temperature of the waste to produce more electricity.
